mdRecord.dcterms:title: Apothecary case
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contains 22 glass vials about 6 cm tall, most with pills, some empty; 2 glass vials about 12cm tall with corks; 2 glass vials about 11cm tall with glass stoppers and metal caps; 22 glass vials about 13cm tall with pills and corks. Vials are labeled and held in with metal clamps. Also contains 2 boxes, one containing glucose solution and another containing aminophylline. Case is very fragile. [original]
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus
